summary: An ordinance accepting a deed of conveyance from A. E. Rothwell and M. H. Rothwell, his wife, dated November 6, 1907, conveying to the City of Seattle the following described property: beginning at a point which is 130 feet north and 30 feet east of the stone monument set for the intersection of Evanston Avenue and North 44th Street, said distances being measured respectively parallel with the west and south marginal line of block 9, Motor Line Addition to the City of Seattle; thence west 40 feet along the south line of lot 5, block 9 of said Addition; thence north 50 feet to a point on the north line of lot 6, block 9 of said Addition; said point being 38.75 feet west of and 50 feet north of the point of beginning; thence east along the north line of said lot 6; 38.75 feet; thence south 50 feet to the point of beginning.
